title: Sketchbook Folio, "Study of Light and Clouds over Beach", 1870–85
medium: Graphite on cream wove paper, bound
provenance: Anna Richards Brewster, Scarsdale, NY, 1905-1952; William T. Brewster
dimensions:
9.1 x 7 cm (3 9/16 x 2 3/4 in.), irregular
Sheet: 19.2 x 12.8 cm (7 9/16 x 5 1/16 in.)
creditline: Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest
description: In foreground, sketchy beach with calm waves. Above, in sky, detailed clouds with possible rain falling in distance.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "Study of Light and Clouds over Beach", 1870–85.
1870–85. Graphite on cream wove paper, bound. Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest. 1953-179-86-50.
